name: Spacelair
detailed_description:
Spacelair is a simple retro sidescroller adventure game that combines some real life dependencies with old fashion parallax graphics. Free to play and use as a development platform for other Python developers, and only 0,99 dollar for Windows users including all future updates.

You are introduced to the town of Juvélåsen, a small coastal village with (among other things) a fishing boat and a spaceship factory. Theme of the story is an apocalypse followed by an escape and some daring exploration. Remember to buy that fan, and good luck.. ;)

Languages in Early Access: Norwegian (English GUI and subtitles from 01.03.2019) final release: Norwegian, English (possibly subtitles on Mandarin, Biscaya and Polish). Players are encuraged to comment this Beta version and help the developer complete the Spacelair release adventure..

short_description: Spacelair is a retro sidescroller game set to end in space exploration mode for all eternity.. With diverse gameplay challenges and without violence or shooting. Dive into the parallax future and discover your lair today!!!

legal_notice:
Spacelair.py is free to play and use as a platform for Python developers, please upload and share the .py file and not a compiled version. Skilled Indie developers interested in partnership are encouraged to contact Bodin Concept to join the Bodin Concept team and develop the Spacelair game with more and new features. Please respect the "1 compiled game per pay" policy. If you give the game a positive comment and a Facebook/Instagram/Twitter and/or YouTube "like" you´ll get a free game license on Steam. Issues regarding abuse or misuse of the brand 'Spacelair' will, in worst case, be solved with lawyers asap.
Hope you enjoy, Espen-André Bodin
